name: Hinata Special
description: file sharing access by special links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER.description: Enter Telegram Username for BOT Owner [Don't Use @]

ADMINS.description: Enter User ID to get Admin rights in BOT [Use Spaces to Separate User ID]

APP_ID.description: Your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: To prevent bot users from downloading/forwarding/screenshotting content sent to the bot [If you want to activate it, change it to True]

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription. If you don't want to use the Fsub, fill in 0

FORCE_SUB_GROUP.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription. If you don't want to use the Fsub, fill in 0

START_MESSAGE.description: The /start message initiates a prefix to the bot, Uses HTML parsemode format
START_MESSAGE.value: HelloðŸ‘‹ {first} I can provide files given by @Bihari_Network, and other users can access them through a special link.

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Force Subscribe bot message, Use HTML parsemode format
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value: Hello {first} You must join Both Channel/Group first to view the shared files PleaseðŸ¥¹ join the Channel & Group first
